title: T 206 Walter Johnson (Hands At Chest)  SGC 20 SOLD
author: cammb

posts.post_title: T 206 Walter Johnson (Hands At Chest)  SGC 20 SOLD
posts.post_content:
Take a chance and send it to PSA.  Will probaly get a VG with qualifier. Has a 350-460 subjects back shipped.  Paypal f/f or add 3%.  SOLD

NOTE. Backgound is BLUE not gray. (scanner problem)

[url=https://flic.kr/p/2a8gnGa][img]https://farm2.staticflickr.com/1791/44058118581_7d573ba67b_b.jpg[/img][/url][url=https://flic.kr/p/2a8gnGa]wojo20[/url] by [url=https://www.flickr.com/photos/156429676@N05/]Tony Biviano[/url], on Flickr

[url=https://flic.kr/p/28KbWsz][img]https://farm2.staticflickr.com/1832/43151933565_5042fdc613_b.jpg[/img][/url][url=https://flic.kr/p/28KbWsz]WOJO20R[/url] by [url=https://www.flickr.com/photos/156429676@N05/]Tony Biviano[/url], on Flickr
Sold if not already gone.  PM incoming.

[quote name="t206kid" post=1804316]Sold if not already gone.  PM incoming.[/QUOTE]

I always think it's strange when buyers say an item is sold. Kinda wishful thinking and kinda territorial. I've seen it a lot recently. I don't like it when I'm a seller as it seems meant to chase away other potential buyers. I've had users post this and then low ball me. More than once. Just my own experience. I have no horse in this race.
Pretty “sold” just means I’ll take it at your asking price?

[quote name="t206kid" post=1804351]Pretty “sold” just means I’ll take it at your asking price?[/QUOTE]

Yeap. I see no issue here.....That is what I would say too. How could you possibly be doing anything wrong. If it is already sold the seller will let you know and if not, then you get it at the price offered.  Nice card, btw...

And if a buyer does post "sold" and then offers anything other than the asking price.....Please PM me.....It won't happen again or they will get booted, if they don't get the boot the first time. No games here...
